entities.name: hermione

entities.name: cormac mclaggen

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who caught Hermione's arm and held her back.

relationships.description: Harry held Hermione back from following Ron into the Great Hall.
Cormac McLaggen was talking about Ron and Ginny.
Harry accused Hermione of Confunding Cormac McLaggen.
Cormac McLaggen's behavior is unrelated to his detention with Snape.
